markdown:
**[Recall Knowledge - Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 48 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 46 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 43 [Vice-Chancellor Vikroti Stroh](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2435) **Source** [Pathfinder #186: Ghost King's Rage](/Sources.aspx?ID=189) pg. 42 **Perception** +33; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12) **Languages** [Abyssal](/Languages.aspx?ID=12), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2), [Infernal](/Languages.aspx?ID=19), [Kelish](/Languages.aspx?ID=38), [Necril](/Languages.aspx?ID=20), [Osiriani](/Languages.aspx?ID=40) **Skills** [Academia Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +35, [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +35, [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) +35, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +31, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +31, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +31, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +35, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +35, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +31 **Str** +4 **Dex** +6 **Con** +5 **Int** +9 **Wis** +9 **Cha** +6 **Items** [_wand of the snowfields_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=757) (7th-level spell) --- **AC** 39 **Fort** +27 **Ref** +28 **Will** +36 **HP** 245 ([negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42), rejuvenation)) **Immunities** [cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=27), [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38) **Resistances** physical 20 (except [magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103) bludgeoning) **Rejuvenation** ([arcane](/Traits.aspx?ID=11), [necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117)) When Vikroti is destroyed, her soul immediately transfers to her _[soul cage](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1545)_. She can be permanently destroyed only if her soul cage is found and destroyed.
**Death's Chill** ([aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=206), [cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=27), [evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65)) 15 feet. Vikroti is surrounded by an unnatural chill. Creatures that enter or begin their turn within the aura take 5d10 cold damage and are [clumsy 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=3) (DC 37 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Fortitude save).
**Counterspell** **Trigger** A creature casts a spell Vikroti has prepared; **Effect** Vikroti expends a prepared spell to counter the triggering creature's casting of that same spell. She loses her spell slot as if she'd cast the triggering spell. Vikroti then attempts to [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) the triggering spell. --- **Speed** 25 feet **Melee** hand +33 ([Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)), **Damage** 6d8+8 cold plus cold beyond cold **Arcane Prepared Spells** DC 44, attack +36 - **Cantrips (9th)** [Ancient Dust](/Spells.aspx?ID=1261), [Chill Touch](/Spells.aspx?ID=35), [Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Ray of Frost](/Spells.aspx?ID=245), [Read Aura](/Spells.aspx?ID=246) - **1st** [Ray of Enfeeblement](/Spells.aspx?ID=244), [True Strike](/Spells.aspx?ID=345) (×2) - **2nd** [Blur](/Spells.aspx?ID=28), [Final Sacrifice](/Spells.aspx?ID=689), [Necromancer's Generosity](/Spells.aspx?ID=955) - **3rd** [Bind Undead](/Spells.aspx?ID=22) (×2), [Mind Reading](/Spells.aspx?ID=194) - **4th** [Dispel Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=78), [Fly](/Spells.aspx?ID=125), [Resist Energy](/Spells.aspx?ID=256) - **5th** [Dimension Door](/Spells.aspx?ID=69), [See Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=271), [Wall of Ice](/Spells.aspx?ID=364) - **6th** [Dominate](/Spells.aspx?ID=87), [False Life](/Spells.aspx?ID=108), [Teleport](/Spells.aspx?ID=338) - **7th** [Cone of Cold](/Spells.aspx?ID=47), [Grim Tendrils](/Spells.aspx?ID=141), [Resist Energy](/Spells.aspx?ID=256) - **8th** [Animate Dead](/Spells.aspx?ID=666), [Polar Ray](/Spells.aspx?ID=224), [Vampiric Touch](/Spells.aspx?ID=354) - **9th** [Eclipse Burst](/Spells.aspx?ID=96), [Frigid Flurry](/Spells.aspx?ID=916), [Polar Ray](/Spells.aspx?ID=224) **Cold Beyond Cold** Vikroti's hand Strike deals cold damage, and the target is [slowed 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=35). A successful DC 44 Fortitude save reduces this to slowed 1 (or negates on a critical success). **Drain Soul Cage** **Frequency** once per day; **Effect** Vikroti taps into her _[soul cage's](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1545)_ power to cast any [arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1) spell up to the highest level she can cast, even if the spell being cast isn't one of her prepared spells. Her _soul cage_ doesn't need to be present for her to use this ability. **Steady Spellcasting** If a reaction would disrupt Vikroti's spellcasting action, Vikroti attempts a DC 15 flat check. On a success, the action isn't disrupted.
name: Vice-Chancellor Vikroti Stroh

text: Vice-Chancellor Vikroti Stroh Recall Knowledge - Undead (Religion): DC 48 Unspecific Lore : DC 46 Specific Lore : DC 43 Vice-Chancellor Vikroti Stroh Source Pathfinder #186: Ghost King's Rage pg. 42 Perception +33; darkvision Languages Abyssal, Common, Draconic, Infernal, Kelish, Necril, Osiriani Skills Academia Lore +35, Arcana +35, Crafting +35, Deception +31, Diplomacy +31, Intimidation +31, Religion +35, Society +35, Stealth +31 Str +4 Dex +6 Con +5 Int +9 Wis +9 Cha +6 Items wand of the snowfields (7th-level spell) --- AC 39 Fort +27 Ref +28 Will +36 HP 245 (negative healing, rejuvenation)) Immunities cold, death effects, disease, paralyzed, poison, unconscious Resistances physical 20 (except magical bludgeoning) Rejuvenation (arcane, necromancy) When Vikroti is destroyed, her soul immediately transfers to her soul cage . She can be permanently destroyed only if her soul cage is found and destroyed. Death's Chill (aura, cold, evocation) 15 feet. Vikroti is surrounded by an unnatural chill. Creatures that enter or begin their turn within the aura take 5d10 cold damage and are clumsy 2 (DC 37 basic Fortitude save). Counterspell Reaction Trigger A creature casts a spell Vikroti has prepared; Effect Vikroti expends a prepared spell to counter the triggering creature's casting of that same spell. She loses her spell slot as if she'd cast the triggering spell. Vikroti then attempts to counteract the triggering spell. --- Speed 25 feet Melee Single Action hand +33 (Finesse, Magical), Damage 6d8+8 cold plus cold beyond cold Arcane Prepared Spells DC 44, attack +36 - Cantrips (9th) Ancient Dust, Chill Touch, Detect Magic, Ray of Frost, Read Aura - 1st Ray of Enfeeblement, True Strike (×2) - 2nd Blur, Final Sacrifice, Necromancer's Generosity - 3rd Bind Undead (×2), Mind Reading - 4th Dispel Magic, Fly, Resist Energy - 5th Dimension Door, See Invisibility, Wall of Ice - 6th Dominate, False Life, Teleport - 7th Cone of Cold, Grim Tendrils, Resist Energy - 8th Animate Dead, Polar Ray, Vampiric Touch - 9th Eclipse Burst, Frigid Flurry, Polar Ray Cold Beyond Cold Vikroti's hand Strike deals cold damage, and the target is slowed 2. A successful DC 44 Fortitude save reduces this to slowed 1 (or negates on a critical success). Drain Soul Cage Free Action Frequency once per day; Effect Vikroti taps into her soul cage's power to cast any arcane spell up to the highest level she can cast, even if the spell being cast isn't one of her prepared spells. Her soul cage doesn't need to be present for her to use this ability. Steady Spellcasting If a reaction would disrupt Vikroti's spellcasting action, Vikroti attempts a DC 15 flat check. On a success, the action isn't disrupted.
